metadata.title: CVE-2023-42956 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin Safari 17.2, iOS 17.2 and iPadOS 17.2, macOS Sonoma 14.2. Processing webcontent may lead to a denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
